idea-plugin.name: Maven Dependency download
idea-plugin.description:
- 解决Maven Pom文件依赖下载失败问题
- Fix the issue that Maven Pom file dependencies fail to be downloaded - 该版本(V1.0)只能进行简单的下载,点击下载后请稍等一会重启项目 - This version (V1.0) can only be downloaded simply, please wait for a while to restart the project after clicking download
idea-plugin.change-notes: - 修复属性占位符(${})无法替换问题 - Fixed an issue where the property placeholder (${}) could not be replaced
